Senior Engineer for Windows platform who acts as the ongoing interface between the client and the IT infrastructure, is dedicated to quality, using exceptional communication skills to keep our world class systems running, can accurately define/interpret a client issue and design a resolution based on deep product knowledge.

.

column16:
Job description
            
Job Description
Role: L2 Monitoring Support - OS
Location: Pune
 
Job Summary – 
A person with good knowledge of Cross OS Skills in Windows & Unix to monitor events & perform the L1.5 / L2 task.
Key responsibilities: Working on monitoring tool and perform L2 / L2.5 for Server Support
 
Years of experience needed – 1 – 2 years.
 
Technical Skills: 
? Experience with Server monitoring tool Zabbix is must and ITSM.
? Should have experience in powershell, phython, ansible scripting.
? Experience in ServiceNow integration with Zabbix
? Perform L1.5/L2 operations & resolve Server related issues under windows & Unix OS admin & mgmt tasks including taking care of tickets associated with resource utilization, Outages etc. 
? Proactively monitor, maintain, and administer OS systems connected to Company’s computing environment. 
? Proactively monitor, maintain, and administer servers and application systems connected to the Company’s computing environment. 
? Perform L1.5/L2 troubleshooting, escalation, and notification of server, application, and security events as assigned. Conduct all necessary follow-up actions based on assignments, policy, and procedures. 
? Serve as a direct point of contact for most customer (internal staff, external) and service provider interaction. Includes receiving and resolving requests via phone, email, and internal ticket system, escalating s/issues to appropriate parties. 
? Gather operational metrics and report them to Infrastructure Management. 
? Include demonstrated competencies and physical, mental, & interpersonal skills. 
? Ability to work independently and in shifts. 
? Effectively collaborates and communicates with the stakeholders and ensure client satisfaction.
 
Qualification:
? Minimum Requirements: -Should have at least a technical bachelor’s degree in engineering or any degree. 0-2 years of related experience.
 
Certification:
? NA

column8: PRIMARY COMPETENCY : Leadership PRIMARY SKILL : Account Delivery Management PRIMARY SKILL PERCENTAGE : 100
column16:
Job description
            
Job Description
Role:  Account   Delivery Manager
Who are we looking for?
A  Client Engagement Leader   responsible for managing an end to end infrastructure outsourcing contract delivered by Mphasis using its own globally located resources, largely in India and UK and US
 
Primary Roles and Responsibilities : 
The role envisages managing the multi-year, IT Infrastructure outsourcing engagement for a Fortune 100 client, as an Account delivery leader. The delivery responsibility is for managing an end to end infrastructure outsourcing contract delivered by Mphasis using its own globally located resources, largely in India and UK and US, as well as 3  rd   party providers for specific services. The KRAs for the role are client CSAT which includes goals on innovation and customer experience, and financial metrics (revenue and profitability).
The responsibilities will include:
? Account governance and representation of Mphasis in client forums and reviews
? Providing thought leadership and contributing to Customer success – position Mphasis as a trusted partner to the client’s business
? People management, team performance governance and delivery governance for large teams
? Management of globally IS technical delivery teams across multiple programs/ projects covering various client initiatives and spanning multiple infrastructure towers, meeting client expectations and contractual commitments consistently.
? Technical engagement with client to generate proactive innovations and transformation initiatives resulting in a positive client experience, client risk management as well as revenue opportunities for Mphasis
? Management of overall P&L for the account and driving cost optimization initiatives. Working closely with the Sales Leader to Grow the Account Globally.
Desired Profile
? Proven track record of success driving excellent client relationships, strategic client partnership, delivery/account management and deployment of large scale and high quality, contemporary, infrastructure technology solutions. A successful track record delivering on CSAT and financial metrics
? A technical background in infrastructure services and experience managing IS account delivery based on ITIL processes and deployment of new services under Infrastructure services
? Preferably handled services or worked in India Service providers outsourcing contracts
? Profile would call for clear understanding of automation led infrastructure delivery, deployment of Quality Management System to measure the CSAT, client end user experience and Success of contracted deliverables
? Proven experience in building and managing client relationships at CIO, department head and business stakeholder levels. Strong business acumen and partnership skills. Managing 3rd party vendors.
? Proven ability in Account management and Governance, including contract management of large, “total outsourcing” contracts with Managed services. Should have led global, UK/Europe/US based accounts of GBP 15M TCV and more. 
? Ability to manage globally distributed technical delivery teams across multiple programs/projects covering various customer geographies, covering full spectrum of infrastructure services – End user, service desk, data center, networks, information security, cloud services and cross functional scope.
 
Qualification:
? Engineering or simialar advanced educational degree.
? Work Experience : minimum experience of 15+ years  
 
What’s in for you?
? At Mphasis, we promise you the perfect opportunity of building technical excellence, understand business performance and nuances, be abreast with the latest happenings in technology world and enjoy a satisfying work life balance. 
? With the current opportunity, you will get to work with the team that has consistently been setting benchmarks for other deliveries in terms of delivery high CSATs, project completion on time and being one of the best teams to work for in the organization. 
? You get an open and transparent culture along with freedom to experimentation and innovation
About the practice/ Project:
? Will be briefed on selection
. 
Who are we?
Mphasis is a leading IT solutions provider, offering Applications, Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) and Infrastructure services globally through a combination of technology knowhow, domain and process expertise. Over the years we have left an indelible impression in the IT solutions domain with an impressive clientele and an extensive global presence. The accolades we have been garnering can be attributed to our undeterred focus in delivering quality solutions across verticals that meet the challenging requirements of our esteemed customers. Our integrated solutions offering is aimed at creating value for our customers, helping them in improving their business processes with minimum hassles and capital outlays. 

            
                Skills
                PRIMARY COMPETENCY : Leadership PRIMARY SKILL : Account Delivery Management PRIMARY SKILL PERCENTAGE : 100
            
            
            
            APPLY
